t: For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the Ziphites came and said to Saul, “Is not David hiding himself among us?”
Save*pn me, O God, by Your name, And*ln vindicate me by Your power.
Hear*ln my prayer, O God; Give*ln ear to the words of my mouth.
For*ln strangers have risen against me And*ln violent men have sought my life; They*ln have not set God before them. Selah.
Behold,*ln God is my helper; The*ln Lord is the sustainer of my soul.
He*ln will recompense the evil to my foes; Destroy*ln them in Your faithfulness.
Willingly*ln I will sacrifice to You; I*ln will give thanks to Your name, O Lord,*s for it is good.
For*ln He has delivered me from all trouble, And*ln my eye has looked with*i satisfaction*i upon my enemies.
